This is a testharness.js-based test.

PASS ConstantSourceNode frames [0, 10) contains only the constant 0. 
PASS ConstantSourceNode frames [10, 300) contains only the constant 1. 
PASS ConstantSourceNode frames [300, 6000) contains only the constant 0. 
PASS ConstantSourceNode started and stopped at the correct times with the correct values. 
PASS ConstantSourceNode.linearRamp(1, 0.5) equals [0.5,0.5001666666666666,0.5003333333333333,0.5005,0.5006666666666667,0.5008333333333334,0.501,0.5011666666666666,0.5013333333333333,0.5015,0.5016666666666667,0.5018333333333334,0.502,0.5021666666666667,0.5023333333333333,0.5025,...] with an element-wise tolerance of {absoluteThreshold: 0, relativeThreshold: 7.161e-7}. 
PASS ConstantSourceNode after ramp contains only the constant 1. 
PASS ConstantSourceNode automation produced the correct values. 
PASS ConstantSourceNode frames [0, 10) contains only the constant 0.
